professional_summary: An aspiring Data Scientist with strong technical skills in web technologies, programming, and data visualization. A fluent coder, curious learner, and innovative problem-solver dedicated to driving actionable insights.

Focused on natural language processing, text classification, prompt engineering, and fine‑tuning generative AI models.

technical_skills.web_development: HTML5, CSS3, Flask, Streamlit, PHP, JavaScript

projects.title: FinTak – Monthly Spending Tracker
projects.description: Built a personal finance management web app using Flask and Google Firestore that enables users to track daily expenses, categorize spending, and visualize monthly trends through dynamic charts. The system supports secure authentication, CRUD operations for transactions, and provides analytical insights like top spending categories, monthly savings patterns, and budget alerts. Integrated date filters, responsive dashboards, and automated data summaries for better financial decision-making.

projects.title: AI Doctor 'Sanjeevani'
projects.description: Developed an intelligent health assistant web app using Flask and MongoDB where users sign up, input symptoms, and receive disease predictions via a trained TabNet model. User inputs are grammar-corrected using an LLM, symptom columns are extracted and passed to the model for prediction. The app visualizes disease probability using pie charts, provides DuckDuckGo-based disease descriptions, and offers autocomplete suggestions powered by FAISS and cosine similarity with associative suggestions ('you might also have...').

projects.title: Climate Analysis & Forecasting Dashboard
projects.description: Built a predictive climate analytics dashboard using Flask and SARIMAX/ARIMAX models to forecast temperature and rainfall for all latitudes and longitudes across India. The project features dynamic visual analytics, animated GIFs for 5-year prediction trends, and interactive time-series visualizations for climate insights.

projects.title: Multilingual Audio & Text Converter
projects.description: Created a robust script using LangChain and Hugging Face models that converts broken or inaudible audio to clear speech, translates Hindi to English, and supports multi-modal text-audio conversion. Designed for accessibility and cross-lingual communication enhancement.

projects.title: Rail Madad Chatbot (Gemma 2B Finetune)
projects.description: Implemented a domain-specific chatbot fine-tuned on the Gemma 2B model using complaint–action data for Indian Railways. The model was trained via Hugging Face Transformers on a custom complaint dataset to predict optimal actions with high accuracy. Integrated into a Flask web app for real-time complaint classification, explanation, and response generation.

projects.title: ResumeRecon
projects.description: Engineered an intelligent CV matcher using LangChain, HuggingFace, FAISS, and Streamlit, supporting bulk uploads, role-specific filtering, and USP extraction.

projects.title: YouTube Doubt Solver
projects.description: Built a question-answering app using Streamlit, LangChain, and HuggingFace, with multilingual transcript translation and RAG-based retrieval.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis on Tweets
projects.description: Performed sentiment analysis using FastText, RNN, and VADER on real-time tweets. Compared results across methods for accuracy and performance.

projects.description: Built a story generation tool using LLMs that crafts custom stories based on user-defined characters, styles, moods, and desired length.

projects.description: Developed a context-aware conversational chatbot for general use, integrating dialogue memory and response optimization.

projects.description: Built a RAG-powered chatbot to answer queries about resumes using FAISS, LangChain, HuggingFace LLMs, and Streamlit.

projects.description: Applied deep-learning segmentation to extract and classify symbols on 100 Indus Valley seals; performed statistical and pattern analysis to assist epigraphic research.
